Name: Let's Pet Pets
About the game: Welcome to the wonderful world of Let's Pet Pets™ ! This is a game where you pet pets to gain Pet Points . Pet Points can be used to purchase Helping Hands . Helping Hands will give you more Pet Points automatically every second (even while you are away). Each Helping Hand can be individually upgraded to give you even more Pet Points . You can also use Pet Points to purchase Items . Items are unlocked through reaching milestones and progressing through your Let's Pet Pets™ journey. These Items have a multitude of effects. From increasing the efficiency of manual pet petting to increasing the duration of the Pet Time Bonus . The Pet Time Bonus is a window of time which will multiply your Pet Point production across all sources. This Pet Point production multiplier will remain active for the duration of the Pet Time Bonus . As you pet pets, upgrade Helping Hands , purchase Items , and play Let's Pet Pets™ you will complete Quests . Quests will earn you Heart Points . Heart Points are a very valuable resource because they let you get new eggs from the Pet Shop . Eggs can hatch into a new pet or upgrade a pet you already have. These Eggs hold a variety of cute animals ranging from Anteaters to Zebras . Each pet has its own unlockable Items , Quests , and even its own Helping Hands . You continue to gain Pet Points from other pets you have bought even while you are petting a different pet. If you feel progress slowing down and need a boost, you can prestige . Activating prestige will reset all your Helping Hands and Items , but you will keep your Eggs , Pets , Quests , and Upgrades . As you can clearly see, petting pets is going to be quite the adventure.
